participant_1.background:
I often visit museums to expand my knowledge of the world and to enjoy the works of art.
I grew up with my parents and siblings.
i also give blood monthly in honor of my sister who died.
I am a single, child-free professional who enjoys flying model airplanes and eating gummy bears.
I'm afraid of not being able to accomplish my dreams.

participant_2.background:
I've been in my current relationship for five years, and it's the longest I've ever been with someone.
I love to dress up and go to comic cons with my husband.
i enjoy eating italian food.
i shop online a lot.
I've been working with my parents for as long as I can remember.

content.text: I am doing well, thanks for asking. I just got back from a museum trip.
Oh, museums are so much fun! I love to learn about new things. Do you have a favorite museum?
I do! I love the Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York City. It has so much to see and explore.
I have heard great things about that museum! I have never been, but I would love to go sometime.
You should definitely go! It's a great place to learn about art and history.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What are some of your hobbies?
I love to dress up and go to comic cons with my husband. It's a lot of fun to meet other people who are interested in the same things you are.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I have never been to a comic con, but I've always wanted to go.
You should definitely go! It's a great way to meet new people and see some amazing costumes.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to fly model airplanes and eat gummy bears.
That's a unique hobby! I've never met anyone who flies model airplanes before.
It's a lot of fun! I've been flying model airplanes since I was a kid.
That's awesome! I'm glad you found something you enjoy doing.
